body_html:
yes,I do as you say.
execute 'bazel build --cxxopt=-std=c++11 -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo'
it report errors.
/home/xx/.cache/bazel/_bazel_xx/701469a9a53002d9d7bcd7284d7ad10b/external/llvm/BUILD.bazel:836:1: C++ compilation of rule '@llvm//:arm_asm_printer' failed (Exit 1) In file included from external/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/InstPrinter/ARMInstPrinter.cpp:18: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCAsmInfo.h:21: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCDwarf.h:24: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Error.h:20: external/llvm/include/llvm/ADT/StringExtras.h:221:35: error: use of undeclared identifier 'strtold' return detail::to_float(T, Num, strtold); ^ 1 error generated.
body_text:
yes,I do as you say.
execute 'bazel build  --cxxopt=-std=c++11 -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo'
it report errors.
/home/xx/.cache/bazel/_bazel_xx/701469a9a53002d9d7bcd7284d7ad10b/external/llvm/BUILD.bazel:836:1: C++ compilation of rule '@llvm//:arm_asm_printer' failed (Exit 1) In file included from external/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/InstPrinter/ARMInstPrinter.cpp:18: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCAsmInfo.h:21: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCDwarf.h:24: In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Error.h:20: external/llvm/include/llvm/ADT/StringExtras.h:221:35: error: use of undeclared identifier 'strtold' return detail::to_float(T, Num, strtold); ^ 1 error generated.
body:
yes,I do as you say.
execute 'bazel build  --cxxopt=-std=c++11 -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo'
it report errors.
`/home/xx/.cache/bazel/_bazel_xx/701469a9a53002d9d7bcd7284d7ad10b/external/llvm/BUILD.bazel:836:1: C++ compilation of rule '@llvm//:arm_asm_printer' failed (Exit 1)
In file included from external/llvm/lib/Target/ARM/InstPrinter/ARMInstPrinter.cpp:18:
In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCAsmInfo.h:21:
In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/MC/MCDwarf.h:24:
In file included from external/llvm/include/llvm/Support/Error.h:20:
external/llvm/include/llvm/ADT/StringExtras.h:221:35: error: use of undeclared identifier 'strtold'
  return detail::to_float(T, Num, strtold);
                                  ^
1 error generated.`
